backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing an e-commerce platform with product management, category hierarchy, user profiles, shopping baskets, Stripe integration, access control, blob storage, and price constraints; includes migration support and admin-only operations.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that ensures the '3d print' category has a 'shape type' subcategory during canister upgrades by checking and adding it if missing.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing JSON-formatted summaries of frontend components, pages, hooks, and configuration files describing the marketplace UI, admin dashboard, category management, product display, cart functionality, and Stripe integration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes, defining colors for backgrounds, foregrounds, cards, buttons, borders, and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading the React application from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component defining TanStack Router with routes for marketplace, admin, cart, payment success/failure pages, all wrapped in a layout with header and footer.
frontend/src/components/AdminManager.tsx: Admin management component with UI for adding/removing administrators by principal ID, displaying current admins in a table, with confirmation dialogs and toast notifications for actions.
frontend/src/components/BatchUploader.ts: Batch product upload component with category selection, image file handling, price validation against category constraints, progress tracking, and sequential upload workflow using start/upload/finish mutations.
frontend/src/components/CategoryFilter.t: A collapsible category filter component that displays hierarchical categories with checkboxes, supporting parent-child relationships and allowing users to filter products by selecting multiple categories.
frontend/src/components/CategorySelector: A category selector dropdown with CRUD operations (create, edit, delete) for managing categories, including parent-child relationships, price constraint display, and comprehensive error handling for admin operations.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: A footer component displaying social media links, about/contact information, and a Caffeine.ai attribution with dynamic UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: A sticky header navigation bar with logo, shop/admin links, and a shopping cart button that displays the current item count badge.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: A product card component displaying product image, name, price, category, and description with 'Buy Now' and 'Add to Cart' buttons that integrate with Stripe checkout and shopping cart functionality.
frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx: A responsive grid layout component that displays filtered products based on selected categories, including support for hierarchical category filtering and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/components/SettingsForm.tsx: A settings form component for configuring store information (name, description, contact email), currency selection, and tax rate with validation and persistence using React Query mutations.
frontend/src/components/SingleProductUpl: React component for uploading individual products with name, price, category, and image; validates price constraints per category and displays upload progress.
frontend/src/components/StripeConfigForm: React component for configuring Stripe payment settings including secret key and allowed countries; displays configuration status and allows updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication; automatically invalidates and refetches dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminManagement.ts: Custom hooks for managing admin users: fetching admin list, adding admins, and removing admins using React Query mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Custom hook for shopping cart operations including fetching basket items, adding/removing items, clearing basket, and calculating item count.
frontend/src/hooks/useCheckout.ts: Custom hook that creates Stripe checkout sessions with success/cancel URLs and returns the session ID and redirect URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity storage, and AuthClient lifecycle with delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/usePriceConstraints.t: Custom hook that fetches price constraints for a specific product category from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Custom hooks for category and product CRUD operations with extensive logging; includes fetching categories, adding categories with parent normalization, and managing products.
frontend/src/hooks/useSettings.ts: Custom hooks for fetching and updating store settings using React Query with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom warm, earthy color palette (terracotta, sage, cream) using OKLCH color space, including light/dark mode themes and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page with tabbed interface for managing products (single/batch upload), Stripe payment configuration, general settings, and admin user management.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shopping cart page displaying cart items with product details, quantities, prices, and checkout functionality using Stripe integration.
frontend/src/pages/MarketplacePage.tsx: Main marketplace page with category filtering sidebar and product grid displaying handcrafted artisan products.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Payment cancellation confirmation page with options to return to cart or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Payment success confirmation page that clears the shopping cart and provides navigation back to marketplace.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters and session storage, supporting both hash-based and browser-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending default theme with custom colors (OKLCH-based), typography, container queries, animations, and design tokens for the application's warm earthy aesthetic.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking a marketplace application with batch image upload, category management, Stripe payment integration, and shopping cart functionality. Contains architectural notes, existing features, known issues, and project metadata at version 33.
